Container.Name: Textarr
Container.Overview: SMS-based media request app that integrates with Sonarr and Radarr. Send a text message to request TV shows or movies, powered by AI.
Container.Description: SMS-based media request app that integrates with Sonarr and Radarr. Send a text message to request TV shows or movies, powered by AI. Requires Twilio account for SMS and OpenAI/Anthropic for AI processing.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the web interface and webhook endpoint

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Path to store configuration and session data

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID to run as (99 for nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID to run as (100 for users on Unraid)

Config.Name: Twilio Account SID
Config.Description: Your Twilio Account SID (starts with AC)

Config.Name: Twilio Auth Token
Config.Description: Your Twilio Auth Token

Config.Name: Twilio Phone Number
Config.Description: Your Twilio phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +15551234567)

Config.Name: AI Provider
Config.Description: AI provider to use: openai, anthropic, or google

Config.Name: AI Model
Config.Description: AI model name (e.g., gpt-4-turbo, claude-3-opus-20240229, gemini-pro)

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: OpenAI API key (required if using OpenAI)

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Anthropic API key (required if using Anthropic)
